short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you automate data creation on the NextGen Platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We will be using this extension to pass some data from internal app and then make use of external API to model some data. This is a helper tool for internal testing team to help do their job efficiently.
